summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening and establishing of Northeast 42nd St. between Roosevelt Way Northeast and 7th Ave. Northeast; Northeast 50th St. between 4th Ave. Northeast and 5th Ave. Northeast and between 7th Ave. Northeast and the alley east thereof all in conformity with existing grade; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; providing for the acquisition of the right to construct slopes for cuts and fills on certain abutting properties; and providing for payment thereof.
